Big-Cirrus.Extended скин от Eraser (В основе скин Big-Cirrus от GMib)
extension.description: Big-Cirrus.Extended is a modded version of GMib's Big-Cirrus skin modded. Cirrus is a lightweight skin which has a focus on speed, ease of use and ease of navigation. It also uses TV logos, cleararts, and cdart if you want them.
